00029 /* Creation flags. */
00030 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00031 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00032 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSUSP. */
00033 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 0xff))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00034 
00035 /* Status flags. */
00036 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00037 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00038 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00039 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT
00040 #define T_STARTED XNSTARTED
00041 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST
00042 #define T_LOCK    XNLOCK
00043 #define T_RRB     XNRRB
00044 #define T_NOSIG   XNASDI
00045 
00046 /* Task hook types. */
00047 #define T_HOOK_START  XNHOOK_THREAD_START
00048 #define T_HOOK_SWITCH XNHOOK_THREAD_SWITCH
00049 #define T_HOOK_DELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00050 #define T_HOOK_DESC(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)
00051 
00052 /* Priority range (same bounds as fusion, but reversed). */
00053 #define T_HIPRIO  FUSION_LOW_PRIO
00054 #define T_LOPRIO  FUSION_HIGH_PRIO
00055 #define rtprio2xn(rtprio) (FUSION_HIGH_PRIO - (rtprio) + 1)
00056 #define xnprio2rt(xnprio) (T_LOPRIO + (xnprio) - 1)

00085 typedef struct rt_task {
00086 
00087     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00088 
00089     xnholder_t link;
00090 
00091     xntimer_t timer;
00092 
00093 #define link2rtask(laddr) \
00094 ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->link)))
00095 
00096     xnthread_t thread_base;
00097 
00098 #define thread2rtask(taddr) \
00099 ((taddr) ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(taddr)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL)
00100 
00101     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00102 
00103     int suspend_depth;
00104 
00105     int overrun;
00106 
00107     xnarch_cpumask_t affinity;

00123     } wait_args;

00125 } RT_TASK;
